aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subTitle: Your Success is Our Mission!
aboutPage.para1: We are a growing international training, professional development, and consulting company with world-class trainers. Established in 2010, Qomo Institute has been upskilling and rebranding organizations, one individual at a time, through needs analysis and training deliveries throughout the world.
aboutPage.para2: We understand that the business community is highly competitive and continuous learning delivered by world-class practitioners to you/your organization will help your brand. Our services are a great solution to creating a “5% Club Culture!
aboutPage.para3: Years ago, an international study was performed and it was discovered that 95% of employees ranged from poor to adequate [“meets expectations’]. The inverse of this demonstrates that only 5% of us care to do more than. These 5% will offer propositions of value, that go above and beyond, in order to make the company, the governmental agency, the department, the team, the business unit, and the individual better! Thus, it is our goal to reach out to 5% CLUB members and make their brand strong
aboutPage.para4: Your brand allows you to stand out from your peers. Training is an investment that yields respect, increase, promotion, and recognition. Commit to your potential today!
aboutPage.para5: Beyond training, our subject-matter experts within our 5 business verticals, are available for: Consulting, Coaching, Mentoring, Auditing services. Please contact us if you have project needs that fit within any of these services.
aboutPage.coreValuesSubTitle1: We celebrate those in the 5% Club daily
aboutPage.coreValuesSubTitle2: We employ only the world's best practioners as our trainers
